msg: Fix the backcopy command, so that new files are copied across

author: jefft
msg: Upgrade to CVS Ant, which has selectors necessary for a decent 'backcopy'

author: jefft
msg: Rewrite 'backcopy' target using a single <copy> and lots of Ant selectors.
- The file already exists in src/documentation/* (and may be modified)
- The file exists in the Forrest distribution, but a modified version exists
in build/webapp/*; ie, the user intends to override a Forrest file
